projects.title: Ecxo Games
projects.description: Co-Founded by me and my friend, Ecxo Games is a game development studio based in Montreal, Canada. We focus on web-based games and apps.

projects.title: GTA High Class
projects.description: Grand Theft Auto High Class, aka GTA High Class, is a content creation project co-founded by me and 3 friends. Two of them left, and one joined, there is now 3 of us. We do content creationon all platforms.
